title: New: Yoke Lore – World Wings
body:
There’s a real early 2010’s feel to this latest track from **Yoke Lore** – I’m talking Washed Out, peak AnCo and a bit of Toro y Moi; i.

e. it’s undeniably brilliant. In his own words _“This song is about starting to whip the wings you have to shake things up around you. If you sit still, you’ll be left behind; get up and don’t let anyone tell you to sit down.” _Inspirational stuff. Be sure to check out Yoke Lore at SXSW this week – dates below.

Weds. 3/15 Twix x Culture COLLiDE // Bar 96 // 4 pm

Thurs. 3/16 Noise Pop x Another Planet // Sidewinder // 12:30 pm

Thurs. 3/16 ILA Showcase // Lambert’s // 4 pm

Fri. 3/17 Wild Honey Pie // Weather Up // 2 pm

Sat. 3/18 Southwest Invasion // Whole Foods Roof Top Plaza // 2:30 pm

Sat. 3/18 Fancy PR x The Burning Ear // Sidewinder // 9:45 pm
